title: dcmsplit
description: Splits DICOM files into separate folders based on a unique identifier (UID).

out_dir.title: Output Directory
out_dir.description: Output directory for split DICOM files

copy.title: Copy Flag
copy.description: Copy files instead of creating symbolic links

link.title: Link Flag
link.description: Link files instead of copying (default behavior)

split_name.title: Split by Name Flag
split_name.description: Split files by patient name instead of UID

split_uid.title: Split by UID Flag
split_uid.description: Split files by Study UID instead of name (default behavior)

series_plus.title: Split by Series and Name/UID Flag
series_plus.description: Split files by series number and either name or UID

dicom_tag.title: DICOM Tag
dicom_tag.description: Split files by given DICOM tag (group element)
